Notes
:
In current-law pension cases, authorize the additional amounts payable for dependents.
Although an additional amount may not be paid under Section 306 Pension for a dependent who cannot be established on or before December 31, 1978, the existence of such a dependent is controlling for purposes of reduction under
38 CFR 3.551(c)
.
An apportionment may be payable to an unestablished dependent, even if additional pension is not being paid for that dependent.
